properties.entry: SELECT A.MEMBER_PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NICKNAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.NICKNAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
